price: Mmaa awaregyaefoͻ no nso monsum wͻn wͻ kwan pa so. (Woi) yε asεdeε a εda Nyame-surofoͻ no soͻ.
arabic: وَلِلۡمُطَلَّقَٰتِ مَتَٰعُۢ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walil'muṭallaqāti matāʿun bil-maʿrūfi ḥaqqan ʿalā al-mutaqīna
